casebody.data:
Donald F. Harris et al. v. City of Hartford (12031)

Dupont, C. J., Foti and Lavery, Js.

Submitted on briefs September 24 decision released October 19, 1993 Donald F. Harris, pro se, and Lisa M. Harris, pro se, the appellants (plaintiffs), filed a brief. Joseph M. Lugo and Helen Apostolidis, assistant corporation counsel, filed a brief for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
